DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To compare contrast enhancement distribution within orbital tissue . III . To assess potential difference contrast enhancement help characterize malignant lesion well discriminate benign tissue . IV . To compare image characteristic clinical high field end ex-vivo ultra high field magnetic resonance ( MR ) imaging . V. To correlate imaging finding obtain histology compare contrast enhancement parameter , e.g . maximum signal intensity , histology characteristic , e.g . vascular density . OUTLINE : Patients undergo DCE-MRI . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 6 month 5 year .
